attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my father a disabled man who is just outside the criteria for housing and council tax benfit has to pay £88+. while a house on the same street not 50 yards away both have 3 bedrooms and are the same size and age is only £74.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
